sentence.Network_en: The cower unit of the Eagle is a wellsorted lithic and glauconitic marine sandstone.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊格尔砂岩的下部单元是分选良好的岩屑质和海相海绿石质.

sentence.Network_en: To trample upon practice is to cower before truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 对实践的专横就是对真理的恐惧.

sentence.Network_en: Although it is very cold, don't cower back. Smile amusedly and cheer.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然非常寒冷, 但是请不要退缩, 开心的笑一下,加油.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... docile（ 温顺的，驯良的）； cower（ 畏缩，抖擞）； succumb（ 屈从，屈服）…
德鲁伊全技能列表_WOW魔兽世界_TG兽吧 ... 突进 Dash 退缩 Cower 挑战咆哮 Challenging Roar.
collet的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... bilobate 两裂片的 ... cower 畏缩, 退缩, 抖缩... eventual 最后的, 终于的.
魔兽世界的动作... ... /cower / 你害怕地退缩了。 你一看到(目标)就害怕地退缩了。 /cry / 你哭了。 你扑在(目标)的肩膀上泣不成声。.

list.abs: The dog cowered when its master beat it ., 主人打它 , 狗便蜷伏起来.
The frightened child cowered in the corner ., 受惊的孩子卷缩在角落里.
The condemned prisoner cowered and began to whimper for clemency ., 那个被判罪的囚犯抖缩著并开始抽泣请求宽恕.
He cowered in the corner , gibbering with terror ., 他蜷缩在角落里 , 吓得喃喃自语.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Middle Low German kūren 'lie in wait', of unknown ultimate origin

entry.def: If you cower, you bend forward and downwards because you are very frightened.

example.ex: The hostages cowered in their seats.

auth_sentence.content: You can almost see the Wigmore Hall cower as Karita Mattila approaches.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can almost see the Wigmore Hall cower as Karita Mattila approaches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can almost see the Wigmore Hall cower as Karita Mattila approaches.

auth_sentence.content: In the mean time, if a primitive people want to cower in fear and depression because of their imaginary vengeful god, let them.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the mean time, if a primitive people want to cower in fear and depression because of their imaginary vengeful god, let them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the mean time, if a primitive people want to cower in fear and depression because of their imaginary vengeful god, let them.

auth_sentence.content: The sailors don't want it because they didn't go to sea to be fired upon, to have to cower in a fire fight.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sailors don't want it because they didn't go to sea to be fired upon, to have to cower in a fire fight.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sailors don't want it because they didn't go to sea to be fired upon, to have to cower in a fire fight.

sentences.en: The naughty dog cowered in a corner.
sentences.cn: 那条不听话的狗退缩到角落里。
